Text:
a great list and may prove useful!
many thanks for the upload!
138 Leechers and ONE Seeder.  Does someone need to explain how TPB works?

Who is banning works like 1984, A Doll's House, The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, Bury my Heart in Wounded Knee, The Origin of Species, etc.? There isn't a single book in this list that can't be found prominently displayed in any decent bookstore in the western world, or obtained online from Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Borders, etc. Where are these books banned? In Saudi Arabia or some other Middle East theocracy?
OK looks like this is doing well, I will no longer seed. Keep it alive guys!

"Who is banning works like 1984, A Doll's House, The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, Bury my Heart in Wounded Knee, The Origin of Species, etc.? There isn't a single book in this list that can't be found prominently displayed in any decent bookstore in the western world, or obtained online from Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Borders, etc. Where are these books banned? In Saudi Arabia or some other Middle East theocracy? "

Yeah probably, but a lot of those books were banned in America for the longest time, a lot only (relatively) recently unbanned. I gather this is a list of books that have been banned in the past, not just currently banned books.

HamEA--

Exactly, I wasn't aware there was confusion about that. Sorry
I wouldn't be surprised to find there are (high) schools today that 'don't carry' some of those books
